TestCase.name: testJsonArrayAgg
TestCase.Resource: GroupAggregate(select=[JSON_ARRAYAGG_ABSENT_ON_NULL_RETRACT($f1) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Calc(select=[f0, JSON_STRING(f0) AS $f1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0])

TestCase.name: testJsonArrayAggInGroupWindow
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, JSON_ARRAYAGG(f0) FROM T GROUP BY f0

GroupAggregate(groupBy=[f0], select=[f0, JSON_ARRAYAGG_ABSENT_ON_NULL($f1) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f0]]) +- Calc(select=[f0, JSON_STRING(f0) AS $f1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0])

TestCase.name: testJsonObjectAggInGroupWindow
TestCase.Resource: SELECT f0, JSON_OBJECTAGG(f1 VALUE f0) FROM T GROUP BY f0

GroupAggregate(groupBy=[f0], select=[f0, JSON_OBJECTAGG_NULL_ON_NULL(f1, $f2) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[f0]]) +- Calc(select=[f0, f1, JSON_STRING(f0) AS $f2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0, f1])

TestCase.name: testJsonObjectAgg
TestCase.Resource: SELECT JSON_OBJECTAGG(f0 VALUE f0) FROM T

GroupAggregate(select=[JSON_OBJECTAGG_NULL_ON_NULL_RETRACT($f1, $f1) AS EXPR$0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Calc(select=[f0, JSON_STRING(f0) AS $f1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T]], fields=[f0])
